entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
